detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract BcoinFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BcoinFinance.sol#74-187) has payable functions:
	 - BcoinFinance.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BcoinFinance.sol#184-186)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
